detail: Well-organized training conducted by skilled and experienced instructors.
Classes conducted using projectors for enhanced visual learning.
Well-equipped computer lab with individual computers for each student.
Not just slide-based lectures — hands-on practical training provided.
Complete guidance and support for building a freelancing and outsourcing career.
Special care and extra support classes for struggling students.
Lifetime support and excellent opportunity for job placement based on skills.
Full assistance in creating professional profile on different marketplaces and guidance in securing work.
Course completion certificate and full support to build a successful online career.
100% job guarantee upon successful completion of the internship.

Over 10 years of experience in training 12,000+ successful freelancers, many of whom are now working confidently and reputably in various local and international marketplaces — some have even built their own businesses.
